short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mindful Carts is a chrome extension that helps you control impulsive shopping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MindfulCarts helps you control impulsive shopping. Simply taking a second to breathe deeply and reminding yourself of what else you could be doing with your time and energy is an effective way to curb unnecessary shopping. 

Mindful Carts ensures you get the chance to do this when you begin and end your shopping experience. 

By using Mindful Carts, youâ€™ll catch yourself before you fall into impulse shopping so you can re-direct that energy to somewhere more fulfilling.
